adjective &amp; adverb.description: (especially as a direction) in a slow tempo and dignified in style.

noun.description: A passage, movement, or composition marked to be performed in a slow tempo and with a dignified style.

proper noun.description: A resort city in west central Florida, southwest of Clearwater; population 72,732 (est. 2008).

origin: Italian, from Latin largus copious, abundant.
